name: lyzr-support-app
description: Complete Lyzr Support Application with React frontend, FastAPI backend, and standalone widget

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:shared && npm run build:widget
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../widget && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build:shared
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
